articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on Tuesday, the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with Ri Sol Ju, made bow to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He recollected with deep emotion the noble revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the sacred cause for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 He made a firm pledge to certainly win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche by conducting all state affairs as intended by Kim Jong Il and the way as he did, true to his behests on making the world look up to the great Party and Kim Il Sung's Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday met and had a talk with in a compatriotic atmosphere the art troupe of Koreans in Japan giving art performance at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).

articles.title: Congratulations to Mauritanian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mauritanian FM
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Monday sent a congratulatory message to Isselkou Ould Ahmed Izid Bih on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. 
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Mauritanian minister bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Russian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Russian Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Kazbek Taisayev, first vice-chairman of the Committee for Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Eurasia Integration and Liaison with Compatriots of the State Duma and secretary of the Central Committee of the party, which paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Wednesday.
					 The gift was conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Feb. 17 by Kazbek Taisayev, first vice-chairman of the Committee for Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Eurasia Integration and Liaison with Compatriots of the State Duma of Russia and secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on a visit to the DPRK as the head of a delegation of the party.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Visits Various Places
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Kazbek Taisayev, first vice-chairman of the Committee for Commonwealth of Independent States Affairs, Eurasia Integration and Liaison with Compatriots of the State Duma and secretary of the Central Committee of the party, visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					 Being briefed on the tower, members of the delegation looked round the tower body and groups of sculptures.
					
					 They went up to the observation deck of the tower to enjoy a bird's-eye view of Pyongyang.
					
					 The delegation visited the venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Sci-Tech Complex, Mirae Scientists Street. Liberation Tower, etc.

articles.title: Party for Birthday of Contributors to Satellite Launch Held
articles.content:
Party for Birthday of Contributors to Satellite Launch Held
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a party at the April 25 Hotel on Wednesday to congratulate the birthday of contributors to the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Present there were officials concerned together with occupiers of the space greeting their birthday.
					
					 A speech was made there.
					
					 The speaker said that Kim Jong Un's warm loving care contains the great trust and expectation that they would always carry out the leading role in the struggle for winning the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 He underscored the need to make great leaping forward and innovation in the struggle for a greater victory for space occupation in the same spirit as what succeeded in satellite launch, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un, and thus translate the part's grand plan for building a space power into a brilliant reality.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The 24th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) was closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Wednesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, working people, youth and students, foreign guests, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Festival prizes were awarded to players of Russia, Belarus, Canada and the DPRK who showed tested art representation and high figure technology.
					
					 Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made a closing address.
					
					 Then followed a demonstration of figure skaters of the DPRK and other countries.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Premiere
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Premiere
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave a performance "Rosy Future of My Homeland Being Blessed in February" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Wednesday in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Invited to enjoy the performance were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairperson of a friendly party, officials concerned, working people, youth and students in the city. 
					
					 Among the audience were overseas compatriots including the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 The performance began with prologue "We Extend Glory to General". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as jangsaenap solo "Attraction and Reverence" and male solo "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". 
					
					 The performers highly praised the sacred and patriotic whole life of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They impressively showed that Chongryon is becoming a model of the world overseas compatriots movement thanks to the warm feeling of kinsmen and noble compatriotic feeling of Kim Jong Il who took warm care of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 They fully represented the steadfast faith and indomitable spirit of Koreans in Japan to open up a fresh heyday, firmly believing in Marshal Kim Jong Un only.

articles.title: Korean Body in Japan Urges Japanese Authorities to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Korean Body in Japan Urges Japanese Authorities to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
Tokyo, February 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan Monday made public a statement in denunciation of Japan's provocative sanctions against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The statement said the Japanese authorities were so much upset and senseless in face of the powerful political and military power of the DPRK and its eye-opening scientific and technical achievements that they slapped independent sanctions against it in disregard of the legitimate right granted to any country. 
					
					 Japan claims its launch of spy satellite by rocket H-2A is a satellite launch but the DPRK's launch of satellite is a "missile launch," a cheer politically motivated fabrication, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The despicable behavior of the Japanese authorities suppressing Korean businessmen and other Koreans in Japan is neither beneficial to Japan's economic development nor to Korea-Japan economic exchange. 
					
					 The statement strongly demanded the Japanese authorities lift the sanctions against Korean businessmen in Japan as early as possible.

articles.title: Jochong Urges Japanese Government to Lift Its Unreasonable Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Jochong Urges Japanese Government to Lift Its Unreasonable Sanctions against DPRK
 Tokyo, February 15 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan (Jochong) issued a statement on Feb. 15 accusing the Japanese government of its reckless act of slapping independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the DPRK's recent satellite launch was an exercise of the legitimate and independent right of a sovereign state and a reasonable and justifiable measure.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Japanese government has unhesitatingly resorted to illegal political-motivated crackdown and inhumane actions of restricting the activities of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and encroaching  upon the life and right of Koreans in Japan once again, finding fault with the above-said launch.
					
					 Whenever the Japanese government gets frantic with the moves against the DPRK and crackdown upon Chongryon, they always put Korean students in Japan to peril.
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese government to stop its unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Sanctions Slammed by Korean Women's Body in Japan
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Sanctions Slammed by Korean Women's Body in Japan
 Tokyo, February 17 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan issued a statement on Feb. 15 blasting Japan's unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement vehemently condemned the Japanese authorities' tyrannical action to unreasonably restrict and suppress the activities of Chongryon and the life of Koreans in Japan, openly disclosing a hostile intent on the DPRK over the H-bomb test intended to foil the U.S. nuclear blackmail and protect the homeland and the launch of earth observation satellite, crystal of ultra modern science and technology.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Sanctions against DPRK and Chongryon Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Sanctions against DPRK and Chongryon Denounced 
 Tokyo, February 16 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan on Monday made public a statement denouncing the Japanese authorities' unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The statement recalled that the Japanese authorities took the despicable measure of disallowing the return to Japan of the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan after their planned visit to the homeland with the best wishes of all Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan, thus blocking their trip, terming it a thrice-cursed tyrannical action. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities' sanctions against the DPRK are, in essence, despicable and inhumane violation of human rights to pressurize Chongryon, the organization protecting life and rights of Koreans in Japan, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The sanctions will spark off bitter condemnation by all Koreans in Japan and conscientious Japanese people and seriously affect the Korea-Japan relations.

articles.title: Koreans' Organization in China Hails Satellite Launch of DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans' Organization in China Hails Satellite Launch of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, on February 12 made public a statement hailing the successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 All Koreans in China extend the warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un on having consolidated the status of a nuclear power of Juche and space power despite the desperate obstructions of any formidable enemy. 
					
					 The earth observation satellite put into the space with indigenous efforts and technology true to Kim Jong Un's plan for building a power of scientific and technological power marked a great event which demonstrated the might of the DPRK before the world and showed once again that it is a matchless power. 
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are now noisily vociferating about additional sanctions, much upset by the DPRK's successful satellite launch, but this is nothing but a ridiculous jargon of the loser. 
					
					 We will wage a vigorous struggle to usher in a new era of independent reunification, deeply cherishing the honor and pride of being overseas citizens of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea highly dignified thanks to the great Songun politics under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Koreans in Ukraine
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Koreans in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine issued a statement on Feb. 12 hailing the DPRK's successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The statement said that the recent satellite launch instills great joy and pride into the overseas compatriots and exalts the dignity and self-respect of the Korean nation.
					
					 It stressed that the launch proves that the DPRK proudly joined the ranks of the powers in the field of science and technology.

articles.title: Meeting of WFDY Supports Korean People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Meeting of WFDY Supports Korean People's Just Cause
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth (WFDY) took place in Moscow between February 5 and 7.
					 Present there were delegations and delegates of 42 countries including the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 The participants of the meeting said imperialists are interfering in the internal affairs of different countries and regions and blockading them and perpetrating aggressions for the purpose of disturbing peace and stability and creating distrust among nations and tribes in a bid to realize their sinister ambition for hegemony. 
					
					 They called for intensifying the solidarity activities against imperialism and extending full support and solidarity to the people and youth of the struggling countries. 
					
					 The meeting adopted a statement of the WFDY on durable peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement referred to the constant danger of war prevailing in the peninsula due to the U.S.-led hostile forces and accused the U.S. of persistently clinging to the hostile policy, shunning the DPRK's proposals for peace.
					
					 It bitterly condemned the U.S. and its followers for stepping up the moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK and escalating the racket for stifling it through the UN arena and strongly urged the U.S. to immediately roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK, the root cause  of the crisis in the peninsula, 
					
					 It strongly demanded the present south Korean authorities stop at once the provocative moves and the psychological warfare against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces and opt for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification in the spirit of north-south declarations.
					
					 It said that the WFDY is firmly convinced that the Korean people and youth will surely win the final victory in the just sacred war against imperialism.

articles.title: International Women's Meeting Held in Indonesia
articles.content:
International Women's Meeting Held in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- An international women's meeting for peace and reunification in the Korean Peninsula took place in Bali of Indonesia between February 7 and 11.
					 Present at the meeting were activists for peace against war in Korea, Sweden, U.S., Japan, Australia and other different countries and regions and overseas compatriots.
					
					 They reviewed the successes and experience gained by the 2015 international women's grand march for reunification and peace in Korea and heard speeches.
					
					 The Korean women are suffering unbearable tragedy, misfortune and pain due to the U.S. deep-rooted and harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK, speakers said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's recent first H-bomb test was a just measure to defend the sovereignty of the country and the vital right of the nation and protect peace in the Korean Peninsula and regional security from the U.S. daily-escalating nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 It is entirely unreasonable for the U.S. and its followers to talk about the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK over its launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					 The meeting adopted a joint agreement calling for intensifying the activities to urge the governments of various countries to demand a halt to the war moves escalating the tension in the peninsula and the conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty and support the women in their actions for achieving peace in the peninsula.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats of leader Kim Jong Il took place in the Czech Republic, DR Congo and Thailand between Feb. 4 and 10.
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said that the DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism despite the blatant challenges of the imperialist allied forces, a clear demonstration of the validity and vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Pribram County Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia noted that Kim Jong Il firmly defended socialism and led the cause of the popular masses for independence to victory through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and extraordinary leadership.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said that the service personnel and people of the DPRK are now bringing about world-startling miracles and innovations in all fields for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of DR Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea said that thanks to the total dedication of Kim Jong Il the DPRK is invariably advancing along the road of Juche and proudly emerged a nuclear power possessed of even H-bomb and satellite manufacturer and launcher. 
					
					 A congratulatory letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Denmark
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint meeting in Copenhagen, Denmark on Feb. 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party in Denmark and the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and masses.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the association and co-chairman of the preparatory committee for celebrating the 74th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, said in a speech that he was the great revolutionary and distinguished political elder who devoted his whole life to achieving the prosperity of socialist Korea and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The feats he performed for the era and mankind would shine forever with his august name, the chairman noted.
					
					 He said that the revolutionary and progressives of Denmark would as ever extend firm support and encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle for the just cause.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Finnish Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Finnish Figures
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings in Finland on Feb. 8 and 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il was the great leader of the Korean people as he shattered the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and victoriously led the arduous march, the forced march under the uplifted banner of Songun and thus defended the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and laid a springboard for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK has become a power capable of launching satellites anytime as it wishes thanks to the firm foundation provided by Kim Jong Il all his life.
					
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said that the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 thanks to the great grit and wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the Songun cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The association will further boost support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people now that the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces are getting frantic in the moves to block the development of independent socialist Korea and stifle it, the chairman noted.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- An article titled "In days of building regular revolutionary armed forces" was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on Jan. 24.
					 President Kim Il Sung built the regular revolutionary armed forces on Feb. 8, 1948 on the basis of the precious experience and tradition he established during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the article said.
					
					 As he energetically led the work for training military and political cadres, many competent military and political cadres grew up and the work for building the regular army was pushed forward and, in the long run, the Korean people came to have regular revolutionary armed forces defending the gains of revolution with arms, it noted.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, which developed into the regular revolutionary armed forces under his Juche-based idea of building the army and wise guidance, is honorably defending the security of the socialist country and people while demonstrating its might as a matchless army, it added.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Nigeria, Mali, Uganda and Guinea between Feb. 4 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said Kim Jong Il directed primary efforts to bolstering up military muscle and thus shattered the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK, firmly defended socialism and brought about a new surge in the socialist cause.
					
					 Thanks to his wise guidance the popular policies are being invariably pursued and grand monumental edifices for the promotion of the people's wellbeing built in succession in the DPRK, translating their desire into a reality, the chairman noted.
					
					 The secretary for culture of the Malian Ministry of Culture, Handicraft and Tourism said that Kim Jong Il is the great master of independent politics to be specially recorded in the world political history. Through his energetic external activities he greatly encouraged the progressive people in their struggle to defend global peace and build an independent world, the secretary added.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement praised Kim Jong Il for developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the ever-victorious revolutionary party, adding that the successes and experience gained by the WPK are examples to be followed by the African revolutionary parties without fail.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the New Socialist Party of Romania on its website on Feb. 12.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con Ri Sol Ju, visito el dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan en ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz y rindio el sublime homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el salon de eternidad donde esta guardado el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					Recordo con emocion la noble vida revolucionaria e inmortales hazanas del Dirigente quien dedico todo lo suyo a la sagrada causa para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					El Mariscal tomo firme decision de lograr sin falta la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche al realizar todos los asuntos estatales solamente segun el proposito y el estilo del Dirigente, en pleno acato a su legado de hacer que el mundo le envidie al gran Partido y la Corea de Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion artistica de ninos escolares por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica de ninos escolares por Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae la funcion artistica de los ninos escolares en celebracion del Dia de la Estrella Luz. 
					La disfrutaron Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, y otros funcionarios de esta entidad juvenil, los jovenes y ninos escolares de la capital.
					
					En la funcion iniciada con la cancion y el baile "Todo el mundo admira a la RPDC" se presentaron diversas piezas entre otras el duo y el coro "Cantemos en voz alta la cancion del General Kim Jong Il", el coro femenino "Respondi a las preguntas de mi hermano", el duo instrumental de Kayagum (instrumento musical coreano de cuerdas) "Soy el capullo de flor", la narracion oral "Mi casa", el baile basado en el cuento dicho por el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il "El erizo que vencio al tigre". 
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron con emocion la gran anoranza y el sentimiento de admiracion al Dirigente quien protegio y preparo las risas claras de los infantes.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Para festejar el cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae ofrecio el dia 16 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion de musica y danza "Sera eterna la cancion del Sol".
					Lo presenciaron los funcionarios de los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de esta capital, las delegaciones de coreanos residentes en ultramar quienes estan de visita en la patria socialista y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					En la funcion iniciada con el preludio "Vals de febrero" se ofrecieron el solo femenino y el coro "Al companero Kim Jong Il", el coro "General corre a caballo blanco", el cuarteto femenino "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" y otras piezas.
					
					Los interpretes elogiaron las hazanas del Dirigente quien preparo el fundamento por la prosperidad de Corea y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras y escribio la historia del espiritu de conceder primacia a las masas populares.
					
					Y se ofrecieron el septeto masculino "El General dirige sobre el terreno a la manera guerrillera", el coro femenino "Cancion de amor por el pueblo", el duo mixto y panchang femenino "Jubilo del pueblo", el solo femenino "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" y otras canciones.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de Banda Chongbong para 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de Banda Chongbong para 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Banda Chongbong del Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan ofrecio el dia 16 en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion dedicada al cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Lo presenciaron los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en esta capital.
					
					En la funcion iniciada con el Himno Patriotico se ofrecieron el preludio "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", el duo femenino "Febrero es primavera", el coro femenino "Brilla, pico Jong Il", el cuarteto femenino "La vida del Dirigente", el coro femenino "Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo como el Sol", el coro femenino "El General es el hijo de la guerrilla", el trio femenino "Luna llena de mi Patria", la musica ligera "Patria, mi amor", la musica ligera para violin "Nuestro padre" y otras canciones famosas que elogian al gran hombre.
					
					Los interpretes cantaron con emocion la anoranza del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea al Dirigente quien abrio nueva epoca de prosperidad de la patria, nunca vista en la historia de 5 mil anos, y preparo la garantia sobre el futuro eterno de Corea jucheana.
					
					La funcion continua.
